name: GetCrux
headline: AI Creative Strategist
description:
GetCrux is the AI Creative Strategist to launch winning ads.

Creatives have become the biggest lever to win on ad platforms. Yet, there is no clear way to figure out why something works. Marketers end up guessing and replicating the best performing ad, only to see it fail - with high CAC & wasted dollars.

GetCrux helps performance marketers find winning patterns in their ad creatives across 100+ parameters like hooks, messaging, storyline, music, pacing, and recommend exactly what to launch next.
tags: industry:saas; industry:analytics; industry:marketing; industry:automation; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Himank Jain, Co-Founder and CEO
founders.description:
Himank is the co-founder and CEO at GetCrux. He has previously worked at J&J as an ML Engineer, leading the NLP initiatives to automate sales transcript and was a data consultant at PwC. 

Himank has graduated from IIT Bombay. During his college time, he headed Mood Indigo which is Asia's largest student-led festival. It attracts artists from 25+ countries and 140K+ visitors nationwide and has raised $500K in capital from global brands. 

Excited about space, spirituality and sports!

founders.name: Atharva Padhye, Founder
founders.description:
Atharva is a co-founder at getcrux. Prev a Renewable Energy Engg grad at IIT Bombay. Started Crux while in college and dropped a management consulting job offer at Bain & Co. Prev worked on Risk Analytics at Citibank.

While in college, I headed Mood Indigo (Asia's largest college festival) where we built the first-ever metaverse for colleges - a 3D experience to explore live events on the campus that brought in 100K viewership in 2 days.

Avid interest in music & international cuisines.

founders.name: Prabhat Singh, Founder
founders.description: Hi! I'm Prabhat, Co-founder of getcrux.ai. I completed my bachelor's at IIT Bombay. Previously, I co-founded a social initiative, Eduride, which helped over 1000 applicants reach their exam centers during COVID-19. I'm passionate about AGI, game design, fintech, and sports.

Problem
## Do you know what makes your ads work?
You think you've found a formula but it suddenly stops working. Ads that you thought were "perfect" end up becoming worst performers. You're left with countless unanswered questions:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65783e649367bc55fecaea2d/677d5b951a2754a479253b58_Frame%202147223315.png)
![Table Metrics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65783e649367bc55fecaea2d/677d5a54c6380bf3c05adc31_Frame%202147223316.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65783e649367bc55fecaea2d/677d5b0bfd3483b4df77a05f_Frame%202147223318.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65783e649367bc55fecaea2d/677d525dc37c1fe63f1cacaf_Frame%202147223320.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65783e649367bc55fecaea2d/677d52fccc546625039abb1b_Frame%202147223319.png)
Meet GetCrux
## Launch winning ads with our AI Creative Strategist
Our AI Creative Strategist finds clear patterns in what works and helps you build a replicable formula for winning ads

FAQs
## We're here to answer all your questions.
Can getcrux's output be trusted to take actions?
Absolutely. We have put all the checks in place to make sure you only get accurate information. getcrux is being reliably used by some of the largest performance marketing teams across the world for ad accounts with 7-8 figure spends. That said, it is early days for LLMs and if you do notice an error, please bring it to us.
How can I start using getcrux?
Our starter plan lets you start a 30-day free trial instantly. You can either ask questions on a demo account or connect your own ad account from Google Ads or Meta Ads. In case you are stuck, feel free to reach out to us on support, refer to the product docs or schedule an onboarding call from the website.
Is it safe to connect my ad accounts to getcrux?
We understand that privacy is an utmost concern when you're handling confidential ad performance data. Rest assured, getcrux is SOC-2 compliant, uses only trusted LLM providers and never stores any of your data without permission. You can opt to remove your account at any time.
How does pricing work?
Our starter plan lets you connect 1 ad account from Google and Meta for free and ask upto 100 questions. To upgrade your plan, refer to the pricing section. We realize that each team is unique so we prefer to custom design a plan that works for you and your team.
## Never fall short of performance targets
Getcrux does the heavlifting to bring you insights that keep you ahead
[Schedule Demo](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/calendly.com/atharva-getcrux/30min>)

Getcrux uses cookies
Preferences  Accept 
##  Your Cookie Preferences 
We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. You may choose which types of cookies to allow and change your preferences at any time. Disabling cookies may impact your experience on this website. You can learn more by viewing our [Cookie Policy](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/getterms.io/>)
Essential Cookies (0) Cookies required to enable basic website functionality.
Functional Cookies (3) Show  Hide  Cookies that are used to enhance the functionality of the website. Platform  |  Name & Description  |  Retention   
---|---|---  
[Cloudflare](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/>) |  **__cf_bm** Cloudflare's bot products identify and mitigate automated traffic to protect your site from bad bots. Cloudflare places the __cf_bm cookie on End User devices that access Customer sites that are protected by Bot Management or Bot Fight Mode. The __cf_bm cookie is necessary for the proper functioning of these bot solutions. |  session   
[Hotjar](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/www.hotjar.com/legal/compliance/opt-out>) |  **_hjSessionUser_** Hotjar cookie that is set when a user first lands on a page with the Hotjar script. It is used to persist the Hotjar User ID, unique to that site on the browser. This ensures that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID. |  365 days   
[Hotjar](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/www.hotjar.com/legal/compliance/opt-out>) |  **_hjSession_** A cookie that holds the current session data. This ensues that subsequent requests within the session window will be attributed to the same Hotjar session. |  30 minutes   
Advertising Cookies (1) Show  Hide  Cookies used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to your interests. Platform  |  Name & Description  |  Retention   
---|---|---  
[Facebook](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/www.facebook.com/about/privacy/>) |  **_fbp** Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers |  4 months   
Performance Cookies (2) Show  Hide  Cookies used to understand how the website is being used. Platform  |  Name & Description  |  Retention   
---|---|---  
[Google Analytics](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/privacy.google.com/take-control.html>) |  **_ga_** ID used to identify users |  2 years   
[Google Analytics](http://getcrux.ai/<https:/privacy.google.com/take-control.html>) |  **_ga** ID used to identify users |  2 years   
Unclassified (7) Show  Hide  Cookies that have not yet been categorized. Name   
---

_reb2bsessionID   
_reb2bgeo

generated_description:
**GetCrux: Your AI-Powered Creative Strategist for Ads**

Founded in 2022 and currently a part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, GetCrux is shaking up the marketing landscape from San Francisco. The company aims to enhance the effectiveness of advertising campaigns using an AI Creative Strategist that helps performance marketers optimize their ads based on data rather than guesswork.

### The Problem at Hand
As any marketer knows, advertising success hinges largely on creative content. However, deciphering the ingredients of a winning ad can feel like chasing shadows. Marketers often find themselves replicating previously successful ads, only to face dismal performance and rising customer acquisition costs (CAC). Enter GetCrux, a tool designed to eliminate the guesswork by analyzing ad creatives across over 100 parameters—from messaging to pacing and beyond.

### What Does GetCrux Do?
GetCrux empowers marketers by identifying winning patterns in their ad creatives, offering actionable insights into what works best. Here are a few vital capabilities:
- **Deep Analysis**: Examine every pixel to understand why certain ads resonate.
- **Creative Fatigue Insights**: Detect when an ad is running out of steam, ensuring marketing budget optimization.
- **Next Steps Recommendations**: Get data-driven suggestions on what to launch next, aligning with brand identity.

### The Team and Vision
With a dedicated team of nine employees and local backing from Y Combinator, GetCrux is led by Harj Taggar as the Group Partner. Their mission is straightforward: to craft a repeatable formula for winning ads, thereby eliminating the uncertainty that plagues many marketing teams.

### Partnerships and Recent Success
Backed by a successful $2.6 million seed round, GetCrux is already making waves in the performance marketing space, focusing on automation, analytics, and AI. Clients can start with a 30-day free trial, providing them a risk-free way to tap into AI-driven marketing insights. 

### Ready to Join the Revolution?
If you're tired of flying blind in your advertising campaigns and want a tool that can not only predict outcomes but also enhance your creative process, GetCrux might just be the answer. You can find more information and request a demo on their website: [GetCrux.ai](http://getcrux.ai/).

In a world where marketing budgets are stretched thin and ad performance can be a roller coaster, GetCrux stands out as a beacon of clarity and efficiency. By utilizing AI to harvest insights from your ads, they promise to keep your performance targets not just within reach, but achievable.
